summary: This document contains detailed call records and charges associated with Joseph Alvarez's mobile phone account during the billing period from April 13 to May 12, 2006. It includes information on incoming and outgoing calls, text messages, and additional charges for premium services.

persons.name: Joseph Alvarez
persons.context: Joseph Alvarez is the account holder for the mobile phone records detailed in this document.

keyFacts: The document details call records for Joseph Alvarez's mobile phone account.
Charges include a total of $50.00 for roaming while in Las Vegas, NV.
There are additional charges for text messages and premium services totaling $54.95.
The billing period covers from April 13 to May 12, 2006.
The document includes multiple entries for incoming and outgoing calls, with various rates and charges.
